member.name: T:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights
member.summary: Provides a set of predefined font weights as static property values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.Black
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 900.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 900.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.Bold
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 700.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 700.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.ExtraBlack
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 950.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 950.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.ExtraBold
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 800.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 800.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.ExtraLight
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 200.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 200.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.Light
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 300.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 300.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.Medium
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 500.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 500.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.Normal
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 400.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 400.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.SemiBold
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 600.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 600.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.SemiLight
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 350.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 350.

member.name: P:Microsoft.UI.Text.FontWeights.Thin
member.summary: Specifies a font weight value of 100.
member.returns: A FontWeight with a Weight value of 100.
